item.title: Haskell Day 1 (Again)
item.description: I’ve restarted my haskell programming education. Here is my implementation of FizzBuzz fizzbuzz x | x `mod` 15 == 0 = "FIZZBUZZ" | x `mod` 3 == 0 = "FIZZ" | x `mod` 5 == 0 = "BUZZ" | otherwise = show x main = print (map fizzbuzz [1..100]) [suffusion-adsense client='ca-pub-6284398857369558’ slot='1495369305’ width='728’ height='90’]
